PySAT 0.2.1beta Released

release
11 Apr 2014 jlaura

Initial MGM integration with PySAT completed. Via a context menu spectra can be moved from a plot window to an MGM window.

PySAT 0.2beta Released

release
04 Apr 2014 jlaura

Initial private beta release of PySAT.
